title: Contentment Is A State Of Mind | Victoria Osteen
itunes:title: Contentment Is A State Of Mind | Victoria Osteen
description:
To enjoy life, we have to learn to be content with where we are. That doesn't mean we don't strive to reach new levels or pursue our goals. When you allow contentment into your life, you can enjoy satisfaction and fullness as you head toward your destination.

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
